Html:
I've never used GMap before but I've been playing around with the demos and it looks like it could be very useful for a project that I'm about to start working on.  Before I settle on using GMap, however, I need to confirm that two things are possible:

1. Is it possible to draw a minimum bounding rectangle (bounding box) around an area on a map?  It looks like you can create polygons but I need a way to fix the shape as a sizable rectangle (just like in MS Paint if you select the rectangle from the shape tool).

2. Assuming that #1 is doable, is it also possible to retrieve lat/long coordinates for the upper-left and lower-right corners of that rectangle?  And if so, is that functionality dependent on any particular map provider(s) or do they all include the geospatial metadata in their tilesets?

Thank you very much for reading as well as any information you can provide!
Hi Radioman.  Thanks for the quick reply!  That's exactly what I was hoping to hear.  :-)
